description: Add `getExperimentalFeatures()` server action to retrieve experimental feature settings from `tenant_settings.settings.experimentalFeatures`
Add `updateExperimentalFeatures(features)` server action to update experimental feature settings
Add `isExperimentalFeatureEnabled(featureKey)` server action for single-feature checks
Create ExperimentalFeaturesSettings React component with toggle list UI
Add 'Experimental Features' tab to SettingsPage.tsx with lazy loading
Display AI Assistant toggle in Experimental Features with name, description, and switch
Add warning banner to Experimental Features tab about feature stability
Wire Save button in Experimental Features to call updateExperimentalFeatures()
Default all experimental features to disabled for new and existing tenants
Gate Quick Ask keyboard shortcut (⌘↑/Ctrl↑) behind aiAssistant feature check in DefaultLayout
Gate QuickAskOverlay rendering behind aiAssistant feature check
Gate Sidebar Chat (⌘L toggle and RightSidebar) behind aiAssistant feature check
Add aiAssistant feature check to /api/chat/v1/completions endpoint, return 403 if disabled
Add aiAssistant feature check to /api/chat/v1/execute endpoint, return 403 if disabled
Add aiAssistant feature check to /api/chat/stream/* endpoints, return 403 if disabled
Create new streaming completions endpoint /api/chat/v1/completions/stream that returns SSE
Modify ChatCompletionsService to support streaming mode with `stream: true` parameter to OpenRouter
Format streaming response as SSE with `data: {"content": "token", "done": false}` format
Send final SSE message `data: {"content": "", "done": true}` when streaming completes
Update Chat.tsx to use streaming endpoint and read response via ReadableStream/getReader()
Parse SSE chunks in Chat.tsx and append tokens to message state incrementally
Support AbortController in streaming fetch to enable stop/cancel mid-generation
Display streaming indicator/cursor while tokens are being received
Handle stream interruption gracefully - show partial response with error indicator
Persist assistant message to database after streaming completes (final content)
Ensure Quick Ask expanded state uses streaming for responses
Ensure Sidebar Chat uses streaming for responses
